Name: Torch that Ignites the Lasting Night
AttributesDescription:
Total Aero DMG is increased by 30%. Enemies take 30% more total Echo Skill DMG.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: Lift your torch higher! Higher still! Until your shadow devours the darkness haunting these walls. Until you become the first to rewrite this long night through the sheer weight of your existence.
ObtainedShowDescription: Total Aero DMG is increased by 30%. Enemies take 30% more total Echo Skill DMG.
